# IDistributionContract
[Git Source](https://github.com/Uniswap/twap-auction/blob/c9923b6612650531d4151de2f459778059410469/src/interfaces/external/IDistributionContract.sol)

**Title:**
IDistributionContract

Interface for token distribution contracts.


## Functions
### onTokensReceived

Notify a distribution contract that it has received the tokens to distribute


```solidity
function onTokensReceived() external;
```
